archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0847
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Disclosure Manager/Analyst, I want to be able to link any digital communication back to a user account by way of any identifier given by NZ Law Enforcement Agencies under statutory orders served, to ensure that we are able to provide evidential records which assist NZ Law Enforcement Agencies in either proving the criminal offending or innocence of customers who are using our services or staff who may be administering the services.

properties.value: It may be a wider requirement than for Comarch. Linking phone number to customer can be done in Comarch.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
